comment: Great professor if you want to learn while gaining skills in writing. She makes the class a whole lot easier by making slides to help guide you through the writing process. If you still feel unsure about the insertion... dont worry she will answer your questions on site to make sure you are successful.

Took her for ENGL 1101 and ENGL 1102 honestly, she makes me want to be an English major. attendance matters. Lenient grading criteria. Great feedback. Gives classtime to complete assignments. Always answers questions in detail.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: kind,helpful and understanding. Attendance required/important to get work done. A couple of discussion post you need to do during the semester but nothing to difficult. Your Literature Review, Research Paper, and presentation all follow one research topic. You use the book a few times but you could just borrow somebodies.

Mrs. McAlister is a great english teacher! Shes super sweet and super helpful. The class I took with her was English 1102 and it was a super easy A. Just make sure you do all the essays (theres only 3) and turn in everything else. Theres discussion posts and a conference presentation but you just use adobe spark for that. Def take her:))
Prof. McAlister is super nice. She always asks if there are any questions, and is always available to help. As long as you do what all the assignments you'll make an A.

rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: She's really good at explaining material and what she expects on assignments. Makes completing her assignments very easy.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor McAlister's class has been one of my favorite simply because you show up, get introduced to a paper or project, work on it in class over the next few weeks, rinse and repeat until the class is done. It's straightforward, easy to get things done in a timely manner, and almost impossible to not get a good grade. I highly recommend.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Professor McAlister has been my favorite professor. All of her assignments are worthwhile, and she only teaches necessary information and doesn't waste anyone's time. She's really funny and chill, but also gives great feedback and is very willing to help. She also posts photos of dachshunds with her announcements. I loooove her, best professor!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Very kind and helpful, gives lots of class time to work on assignments. Uses fun/interesting examples to explain content and keep students engaged. Flexible grader, lets class out early frequently. Great professor

rating_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Amazing lectures--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: My favorite professor of the semester. Always made the lectures interesting. A little monotoned at times but what she's saying is always helpful. Good at answering questions. Took attendance every day but class is worth coming to. Feedback on work is amazing.

She's young but she knows what shes talking about. She is super caring and a flexible grader. If you follow the rubrics and the outlines you'll do good. She also teaches english 1102 which I plan in taking.
